thread.title: Joseph Foster-hug
thread.title_full: Lucky Tackle Box reviewed by Joseph Foster-hug

author: Joseph Foster-hug
title: Joseph Foster-hug
text:
I am very satisfied by my services, Mel is by far the best customer care representative I have ever come across, she's punctual very helpful and knows her job very well, she got right back to me every single time I am more than happy to say that I am glad she was there to help me! As for all of the lTB crew!
Thank you very much! Joseph
